segments.text: I'm trying to send the instruction book by E-mail , but I failed many , many times . And there is something wrong with the net maybe . It's so slow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , maybe the net is slow now . Try it again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am used to editing with Word 2003 , and there are many pictures in the book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's beyond question . You can save it the same as a document .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I merely know how to send the direct letter . But I am not familiar with the attachment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the same as usual . The only difference lies in that you need to paste the book as an attachment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I mail the book if it is a large file ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are limitations to the capacity of an E-mail . Commonly it's no more than 4 MB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if it exceeds the capacity ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can divide it into several documents to mail . Or you can download the mentioned software from the warning .
segments.speaker: S1
